summary.para: Specifies alpha blending parameters for video processing. Used by the [D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_INPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS]ns-d3d12video-d3d12_video_process_input_stream_arguments) structure.

remarks.para: For each pixel, the destination color value is computed as follows:

para.code: Cd = Cs * (As * Ap * Ae) + Cd * (1.0 - As * Ap * Ae)

item.description: Cd = The color value of the destination pixel
Cs = The color value of the source pixel
Ae = The palette-entry alpha value, or 1.0 (palette-entry alpha values apply only to palettized color formats)

summary.para: A boolean value specifying whether alpha blending is enabled.
The planar alpha value. The value can range from 0.0 (transparent) to 1.0 (opaque). If Enable is FALSe, this parameter is ignored.
